item.title: A new provisioning tool built with mgmt
item.description: Today I’m announcing a new type of provisioning tool. This is both the culmination of a long road, and the start of a new era. Please read on for all of the details. Feel free to skip to the relevant sections you’re interested in if you don’t want all of the background. Ten years: The vision for this specific tool started around ten years ago. Previously, as a sysadmin, I spent a lot of my time using a configuration management tool called puppet.

item.title: Captive web portals are considered harmful
item.description: Recently, when I tried to accessÂ http://slashdot.org/ in Firefox, I would see my browser title bar flash briefly to “AT&T GUI”, and then I would get redirected to: http://slashdot.org/cgi-bin/redirect.ha which returns slashdot’s custom error 404 page! What is going on? (Read on for answer…) Did slashdot mess up their mod_rewrite config? (Nope, works fine in a different browser...) Did my HTTPS everywhere extension go crazy? (Nope, still broken when disabled...) Are my HTTP requests being MITM-ed?
